meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> runs into <radical>nine</radical> <radical>tree</radical>s and produces a <kanji>dye</kanji> the color of the forest. The tsunami water mixes with each tree, nine of them actually, and the resulting liquid is a forest green dye.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>dye</kanji> continues to pass through the forest and hits a group of <reading>cen</reading>taurs (せん). Now each centaur is dyed with the forest green dye. They don’t look happy.
